Class ec.transform.classparser.MethodIntr 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.transform.classparser.MethodIntr
public class MethodIntr
extends Object
implements Enumeration
Allows the caller to interate over all the methods in a class.

MethodIntr(Method[])
Build a MethodIntr.

hasMoreElements()
Ask if there are any more methods.
nextElement()
Get the next Method.

MethodIntr 
 public MethodIntr(Method methods[])
Build a MethodIntr.

Parameters:
methods - the array of Method objects in the class

hasMoreElements 
 public boolean hasMoreElements()
Ask if there are any more methods.

nextElement 
 public Object nextElement()
Get the next Method. (Caller will have to cast the result)
